ygData.subject: Re: Rules and FAQ 1.1
ygData.msgSnippet: Talies, A suggestion for the FAQ, when you add new information to the FAQ could you put a reference to it in a new/update section?  I m lazy:p Rokenn Swiftsong
ygData.messageBody:
Talies,
A suggestion for the FAQ, when you add new information to the FAQ could you
put a reference to it in a new/update section? I'm lazy:p

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
